thread.title: January 5, 2024 - Mississippi Free Press

title: January 5, 2024 - Mississippi Free Press
text: [Grant Helps New Mississippi AI Collaborative Jumpstart Digital Equity Programs](https://www.mississippifreepress.org/38837/grant-helps-new-mississippi-ai-collaborative-jumpstart-digital-equity-programs) The Mississippi AI Collaborative will use a $250,000 grant award to expand artificial intelligence knowledge and use across the state. [Publisherâ€™s Note | Thank You For Helping Us Grow Journalism Focused on Solutions and Equity](https://www.mississippifreepress.org/38835/publishers-note-thank-you-for-helping-us-grow-journalism-focused-on-solutions-and-equity) Thank you for helping us grow journalism focused on solutions and equity. With your help, we exceeded our $200,000 NewMatch fundraising goal. [George County Deputy Jeremy Malone Shot, Killed During Traffic Stop](https://www.mississippifreepress.org/38833/george-county-deputy-jeremy-malone-shot-killed-during-traffic-stop) George County Deputy Jeremy Malone was shot and killed after he stopped a vehicle around 5:15 p.m. on U.S. Route 98 in Rocky Creek.
